title: Toxicity
body:
Am I the only person that thinks people are getting extremely overzealous with reporting "toxicity"?
Like, someone lightly flaming you shouldn't be a bannable offense imo.
Thoughts?

replies.body:
If you flame you deserve to be reported, thats how it works

- "but i only flamed a little"

well, may be they only reported you a little

Is flaming akin to criticism? are people above criticism?

what is flaming? 
Because if its just an attempt to hurt, then I feel hurt by your snide comment.

Can I report you for flaming?
